Title: Coronavirus ni mbi cyane yankoronije ubwonko: Imibereho ya Papa Sava muri ibi bihe
Body:
Igihe Leta yatanze cyo kuguma mu rugo mu rwego rwo kwirinda coronavirus kirakomeje,umukinnyi wa filime Niyitegeka Gratien uzwi nka Papa Sava avuga ko byamugizeho ingaruka nyinshi zikomeye ariko ko byari bikwiriye kuko ari ukurengera ubuzima bwâ€™Abanyarwanda.
Igihe Leta yatanze cyo kuguma mu rugo mu rwego rwo kwirinda coronavirus kirakomeje,umukinnyi wa filime Niyitegeka Gratien uzwi nka Papa Sava avuga ko byamugizeho ingaruka nyinshi zikomeye ariko ko byari bikwiriye kuko ari ukurengera ubuzima bwâ€™Abanyarwanda.
Uyu mukinnyi wa Filime uzwi cyane mu Rwanda avuga ko Coronavirus yabangamiye cyane ibikorwa bye ariko ikanamwica mu mutwe kuko inganzo ye yahazahariye.
Yagize ati â€œNyuma yâ€™ibi bihe ni ukuzahura uruganda rwanjye rwâ€™ubuhanzi! Coronavirus ni mbi cyane yanankoronije ubwonko,nari nzi ko wenda nzaba nduhutse nkahimba ariko ntibikunda nabyo.â€
Yunzemo agira ati â€œNkâ€™umuntu wari umenyereye kubyuka saa kumi nâ€™imwe natinda sindenze saa moya za mu gitondo ngiye mu kazi akenshi kajyanye no gukina, biragoye kumva ko ntaho ndibujye icyumweru kigashira.â€
Ikindi Coronavirus yabangamiyeho Papa Sava ni siporo yajyaga akora buri mugoroba azenguruka ahantu hatandukanye mu mujyi wa Kigali nâ€™amaguru ubu atakibasha gukora.
Papa Sava avuga ko imishinga ye yose iri kuhadindirira. Ati â€œImishinga yanjye yose yaradindiye, nta gufata amashusho, nta kwamamaza, nta studio, urumva ni ibibazo nyine.â€
Niyitegeka yagiriye Abanyarwanda inama yo kumvira ubuyobozi baguma mu rugo.
Ati â€œAbagera aho bakirara ndabibutsa ko icyorezo cyo kitirara, kirekereje uwo kigutura!â€
Kugeza ubu imirimo yo gufata amashusho ya Filime nka Seburikoko na Papa Sava zose akinamo yarahagaritswe kugeza igihe amabwiriza mashya azatangirwa.

Title: Abatishoboye bagiye gufashwa nyuma yâ€™ubukangurambaga bwatangijwe na Bruce Melodie
Body:
Icyiciro cya mbere cyâ€™abatishoboye kigiye gushyikirizwa ubufasha bwakusanyijwe mu bukangurambaga bwatangijwe na Itahiwacu Bruce [Bruce Melodie] bwo kugoboka abagizweho ingaruka nâ€™ibihe bya Coronavirus.
Icyiciro cya mbere cyâ€™abatishoboye kigiye gushyikirizwa ubufasha bwakusanyijwe mu bukangurambaga bwatangijwe na Itahiwacu Bruce [Bruce Melodie] bwo kugoboka abagizweho ingaruka nâ€™ibihe bya Coronavirus.
Mu minsi ishize binyuze mu kiganiro The Choice gica kuri Televiziyo ya Isibo hanyuze ikiganiro Bruce Melodie yatangirijemo ubukangurambaga bugamije gufasha abatishoboye byâ€™umwihariko abana bo ku muhanda mu bihe bya Coronavirus.
Ubu bukangurambaga bwakiriwe neza ndetse aba mbere bagiye gushyikirizwa imfashanyo izava mu gikorwa cyo gukusanya amafaranga kizahagarara ku wa Kane tariki 2 Mata 2020.
Phil Peter ukora mu kiganiro The Choice yabwiye IGIHE ko bakomeje gukusanya amafaranga yo gufasha abatishoboye nyuma yâ€™ubukangurambaga bwatangijwe na Bruce Melodie.
Ati â€Twagiye dushaka ko abahanzi bagira ubutumwa batanga babinyujije mu kuririmba ariko dusanga afite [Bruce Melodie] igitekerezo kindi kirimo gufasha abatishoboye barimo nâ€™abana bo ku muhanda muri ibi bihe byo kwirinda Coronavirus bashobora kuba batabayeho neza.â€
Yakomeje avuga ko bahise binjira muri ubu bukangurambaga babinyujije mu gukora itsinda rya WhatsApp bishyira hamwe bagamije gukusanya inkunga.
Phil Peter avuga ko kugeza ubu bamaze kugira arenga ibihumbi 500 Frw mu gihe hari benshi bataratanga ariko bemeye â€™kudutera ingabo mu bituguâ€™.
Uyu munyamakuru yashimiye abarimo Mimi Mirage witanze 250 000 Frw; Ishimwe Clement watanze 50 000 Frw nâ€™abandi muri rusange ariko byâ€™umwihariko Bruce Melodie watangiye ubu bukangurambaga agahita atanga ibihumbi 100 Frw.
Abazafashwa muri ibi bihe bazashyikirizwa inkunga ku wa Gatandatu tariki 4 Mata 2020 ubwo bazaba bamaze guteranya amafaranga yabonetse no kujya inama ku bo bazafasha.
Nyuma yo gushyikiriza aba inkunga izaba yabonetse, Phil Peter yavuze ko bazaba basubitse ibi bikorwa bishingiye ku bukangurambaga bwatangijwe na Bruce Melodie ariko batazahagarika gufasha abatishoboye muri rusange cyane ko ari ibintu basanzwe bakora.
Ikiganiro na Phil Peter uri mu bayoboye ubukangurambaga bwo gufasha abatishoboye

Title: Senderi yakoze indirimbo igaragaza ibihombo Coronavirus imaze guteza abantu
Body:
Senderi International Hit yashyize hanze indirimbo nshya â€˜Corona Gezahoâ€™ ivuga ku bihombo Coronavirus imaze guteza abantu batandukanye mu Rwanda no ku Isi yose.
Senderi International Hit yashyize hanze indirimbo nshya â€˜Corona Gezahoâ€™ ivuga ku bihombo Coronavirus imaze guteza abantu batandukanye mu Rwanda no ku Isi yose.
Uyu muhanzi yabwiye IGIHE ko yahimbye iyi ndirimbo nyuma yo gutekereza agasanga hari ibintu byinshi iki cyorezo cyahinduye mu buzima rusange bwâ€™abantu ndetse ikanabahombya.
Hari nkâ€™aho agira ati â€œCorona waturaje rwantambi, uhombya ibihugu karahava. Watumye abagabo bari baramenyereye agahiye banyarukira ku gikoma, watumye abakobwa benshi babura amafaranga yo kuganira nâ€™inshutiâ€¦â€
Yavuze ko yayitekereje nyuma yo gusanga hari ibintu byinshi Coronavirus imaze gukora mu buzima bwâ€™abantu.
Yagize ati â€œNatekereje iyi ndirimbo kubera ko iki cyorezo hari ibintu bitandukanye cyagiye gikora mu buzima bwacu, kandi byose byagiye bigira ingaruka zitari nziza.â€
Iyi ndirimbo yakorewe muri Monster Records na Producer Knox uri mu bari kwigaragaza muri iki gihe.
Senderi tariki 27 Gashyantare 2020 yahawe igihembo nâ€™Akarere avukamo ka Kirehe mu Ntara yâ€™Uburasirazuba kubera gukora ibihangano bishimisha abaturage bâ€™aho akomoka nâ€™utundi turere muri gahunda zâ€™iterambere ryâ€™igihugu.
Uyu muhanzi yatangiye kuririmba mbere gato ya 1994. Umuziki we wiganjemo indirimbo zivuga kuri politiki yâ€™iterambere ryâ€™igihugu, isuku, kwirinda ibyorezo nka Sida na Malariya, ubukungu, urukundo, umutekano nâ€™ibindi.
Senderi kandi akunda no kwibanda ku ndirimbo zihumuriza abarokotse Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994 nâ€™izamagana abahembera amacakubiri.

Title: Aba DJ bâ€™igitsinagore bahesheje ikuzo uyu mwuga ku isoko ryâ€™umuziki wâ€™u Rwanda
Body:
Benshi mu mpera zâ€™icyumweru mu bihe bisanzwe usanga basiganwa bashaka aho kwidagadurira, bafata kamwe kaba gaherekejwe nâ€™ibindi bintu birimo umuziki uryoha cyane iyo uhuye nâ€™abamaze kwizihirwa.
Benshi mu mpera zâ€™icyumweru mu bihe bisanzwe usanga basiganwa bashaka aho kwidagadurira, bafata kamwe kaba gaherekejwe nâ€™ibindi bintu birimo umuziki uryoha cyane iyo uhuye nâ€™abamaze kwizihirwa.
Aba-DJ ni abantu bâ€™ingenzi cyane bafasha benshi kuryoherwa no gukomeza gusunika amasaha bumva ari ukwihuta cyane mu buryo bukomeye.
Utubyiniro nâ€™utubari dutandukanye muri Kigali no hanze yayo dukunda kugira ubushyuhe usanga tubifashisha mu kongera icyanga no kutarambirwa ku baba badusohokeyemo.
Umwuga wo kuvanga imiziki ntabwo ukiri uwâ€™abagabo gusa kuko ku Isi yose nâ€™abâ€™igitsinagore bawuhagurukiye ndetse no mu Rwanda ntibatangwa cyane ko umubare munini usigaye wiganje mu bawukora.
Nko ku mugabane wa Afurika hari abakobwa batandukanye bamaze kubaka izina mu mwuga wâ€™ubu-Dj biganjemo abo muri Afurika yâ€™Epfo. Abo twavugamo nka DJ Zinhle, DJ Cuppy nâ€™abandi bamaze kuba ibimenyabose banitabira ibihembo bitandukanye bikomeye.
Muri Afurika yâ€™Iburasirazuba hazwi cyane uwitwa DJ Sinyorita wo muri Tanzania uzwi mu bitaramo byinshi byâ€™abahanzi bakomeye muri iki gihugu ndetse uherutse no gutumirwa mu Rwanda mu cyo gusoza umwaka wa 2019, uyu anacuranga kuri Radiyo Clouds Fm ikomeye muri iki gihugu.
Hari nâ€™abandi bamaze kubaka izina ku Isi yose ndetse bagezweho muri iki gihe barimo Charlotte de Witte wo mu Bubiligi, Alison Wonderland wo muri Australie, Dj Rezz wo muri Canada nâ€™abandi.
Mu Rwanda ntabwo nabo batanzwe! IGIHE yakusanyije abâ€™igitsinagore bakora uyu mwuga mu Rwanda umunsi ku wundi, barimo nâ€™abahisemo kubanziriza abandi bari baratinye kuwukora kuko ari umwuga ugoranye dore ko akenshi ukorwa mu masaha yâ€™ijoro.
DJ Tatiana
Uyu mukobwa abarizwa muri Fata DJs abanamo nâ€™undi musore witwa DJ Drizzy, iri nâ€™itsinda rya ba DJ rituruka muri Fatakumavuta Entertainment.
Ubusanzwe yitwa Iradukunda Tatiane, yiga muri Kaminuza ya UTB. Yatangiye kwiga ibijyanye no kuvanga imiziki mu 2015 mu ishuri ryagiye rifasha benshi rya Scratch Music Academy riherereye mu Mujyi wa Kigali.
Kuvanga imiziki mu buryo bwâ€™umwuga yabyinjiyemo mu 2019 aho akorera ahantu hatandukanye hazwi nâ€™abanyabirori muri Kigali nka Tequila Paradise Kicukiro, i Remera muri Sky Luxy Lounge hagezweho cyane muri iki gihe, Quilan, Gisenyi Tamu Tamu, Roxy Club hazwi nko kwa Nyanja, Gisara Montana hotel nâ€™ahandi.
DJ Princess Flor
Nyirimbabazi Hilde Flora umaze kwamamara i Burayi nka DJ Princess Flor, ni umwe mu banyarwandakazi bamaze kubaka ibigwi muri uyu mwuga ndetse akunze kuzenguruka mu bihugu bitandukanye ari ko kazi agiyemo.
Yabwiye IGIHE ko yatangiye kuvanga imiziki mu 2010, mu 2011 agatangira abikora nkâ€™akazi ko mu biruhuko ubwo yabaga avuye ku ishuri nyuma biza kumuviramo akazi ka buri munsi kanamutunze kugeza ubu.
Uyu mukobwa wabuze ababyeyi akiri muto avuga ko musaza we akurikira ariwe wagiye amufasha akamushyirira indirimbo ku ma CD. Aterwa ishema no kuba akora aka kazi nkâ€™umwuga kandi ariko kamutunze byâ€™umwihariko nkâ€™umukobwa.
Urondoye ibitaramo amaze gucurangamo urutonde rwaba rurerure kuko yacuranze mu iserukiramuco ryo mu Bubiligi rya bomboclat, Guinness festival Cameroun Douala, Nyamacoma Festival Dar es Salaam, Avant premiÃ¨re cya Eddy Kenzo muri GuinÃ©e Conakry, igitaramo cyahuriyemo Davido na Ali Kiba, ibitaramo bya Meddy byazengurutse mu Bwongereza, Festival Waka Waka Danemark, muri Rwanda Day, igitaramo cya Tekno mu Budage, Festival Antigel Suisse, Kigali Summer Fest nâ€™ibindi.
DJ Sonia
Afite imyaka 21 yâ€™amavuko ubusanzwe yitwa Sonia Kayitesi, yavutse ku wa 11 Nzeri 1998. Yiga muri Christian University of Rwanda mu Mujyi wa Kigali mu mwaka wa Kabiri mu ishami rya Business Management.
Yatangiye ibyo kuvanga imiziki mu 2019. Avuga ko abikora nkâ€™umwuga ndetse bikaba nâ€™akazi kamutunze.
Ati â€œMbikora nkâ€™umwuga nâ€™akazi numva ko ntacyo kantwaye, nta soni kantera cyangwa kumva ko naba nkakora nkâ€™uwishimisha. Birantunze hari byinshi kamaze kungezaho kandi ni byinshi nshaka kuzageraho mbikuye muri aka kazi.â€
Yacuranze ahantu hatandukanye harimo White Club, akanacuranga mu bitaramo ngarukakwezi bikunze kuhategurirwa bizwi nka Silent Disco.
Yakoze muri Silent disco yabereye i Musanzwe kuri Noheli yari yateguwe na Descent Entertainment ya Muyoboke Alex, akorera i Huye mu kabari kitwa Upendi Pub, akora mu bitaramo byinshi byabereye ku bwogero birimo ibyâ€™i Musanze kuri Fatima Hotel, Kigali Sports View na Tour du Rwanda After Party yâ€™uyu mwaka Musanze.
Ni umu-DJ uhoraho kandi ahitwa Plazzo Resto & Bar ndetse akorana na Anitha Pendo muri Bauhaus mu bitaramo byahariwe igitsinagore biba kuwa Gatandatu.
DJ Ira
Ubusanzwe yitwa Iradukunda Divine mu mwuga wo kuvanga imiziki azwi cyane nka â€˜DJ Iraâ€™. Afitanye isano na DJ Bisosso umaze kubaka ibigwi muri uyu mwuga. Ira yaje i Kigali aturutse mu Burundi, yaje muri Kanama 2015 ubwo yari arangije amashuri yisumbuye ndetse nibwo yatangiye kubyiga abifashijwemo na DJ Bisosso.
Yatangiye kwifuza gukora nkâ€™ibya DJ Bisosso akiri muto gusa abo mu muryango baramwangira bamusaba ko yazabyinjiramo arangije kwiga.
Ni umwe mu bacuranga mu birori bitandukanye bikomeye bibera mu Mujyi wa Kigali. Yacuranze mu bitaramo bitandukanye bya Silent Disco muri White Club, yacuranze mu bitaramo byinshi bya Miss Rwanda, Primus Guma Guma, Iwacu Muzika Festival nâ€™ahandi.
Uyu mukobwa ni nawe wavangiye umuziki abitabiriye ibirori byo gutora Nyampinga wâ€™u Rwanda mu ntangiriro zâ€™uyu mwaka, ubwo Nishimwe Naomie yegukanaga ikamba.
DJ Fabiola
Amazina asanzwe yitwa Uwakayumba Fabiola amaze kwamamara ku mazina ya DJ Fabiola mu tubari dutandukanye, utubyiniro ndetse no mu bindi birori bihuza abantu batandukanye. Yagiye yitabira ibi bikorwa mu gihugu hose.
Yiga mu mwaka wa kabiri wa kaminuza. Yize ibyo kuvanga imiziki mu ishuri rimaze kwamamara ryagiye riba isoko yâ€™ubumenyi ku ba-DJ benshi tuzi muri iki gihe rya Scratch Music Academy rikorera mu Mujyi wa Kigali rwagati.
Ubu uyu mukobwa yifashishwa kuri Magic FM ya RBA mu kiganiro Juice & The Mix.
 DJ Brianne
Yitwa Gateka Brianne, yavutse mu 1996. Yavukiye muri Kenya nyuma yongera kuza mu Rwanda ari umwana, akurira ku Kimihurura. Yasoje amashuri yisumbuye mu 2013.
Yatangiye kwiga ibijyanye no kuvanga imiziki mu 2019 muri Mata. Yari yarabanje kubyigira muri Kenya, nyuma aje mu Rwanda afashwa nâ€™uwitwa DJ Yolo na DJ Theo.
Yakoze mu bitaramo bya Silent Disco; mu tubyiniro nka People, Sky Luxy, muri Fuchsia Lounge yâ€™i Remera hazwi cyane nko â€œKwa Julesâ€, Bahaus na Sandauna ku Kimihurura.
Yacuranze mu bindi bitaramo birimo Valentineâ€™s Pool Party nâ€™ibindi bitandukanye. Yanabaye umu-DJ ku Isango Star mu kiganiro cyitwa â€˜The Hands Upâ€™.
DJ Anitha Pendo
Anitha Pendo ni umwe mu bavanga imiziki bakomeye bâ€™abagore mu Rwanda abikomatanya no kuba ari umunyamakuru ukundwa na benshi, umushyushyarugamba (MC), umubyinnyi muri Mashirika nâ€™izindi mpano zitandukanye.
Ni nâ€™umu-DJ mu tubyiniro dutandukanye two mu Mujyi wa Kigali. Uyu mwuga avuga ko yawinjiyemo mu rwego rwo kwerekana ko mu Rwanda naho hari abâ€™igitsinagore bawushobora ndetse yaranabihuguriwe. Mu 2010 nibwo yatangiye kugira intekerezo zo gukora uyu mwuga.
Ati â€œNaravuze nti nta mukobwa nâ€™umwe mu Rwanda ukora umwuga wo kuvanga imiziki. Mbikora ari ukurwanira ishyaka abakobwa, hari haje umukobwa wavuye muri Kenya ari DJ, murebye ndavuga nti â€˜ni gute Flida ashobora gukora uyu mwuga njye bikananiraâ€™ ndavuga nti â€˜Oyaâ€™ . Gufata mixer ukazamura no gutoranya indirimbo nsanga byose bitananira, mpita mfata amafaranga njya kwiga muri Kenya.â€
Anitha Pendo yacuranze mu tubyiniro turimo White Club, Bahause igezweho muri Nyamirambo, Envy Night Club nâ€™ahandi hatandukanye.
DJ Cyusa
Uwiringiyimana Ange Cyusa yavutse mu 1997 mu Ntara yâ€™Amajyaruguru mu karere ka Gicumbi. Yize amashuri abanza ku Rwesero, icyiciro rusange acyiga ku Rwunge rwâ€™Amashuri rwa Apac Byumba Inyange mu gihe yasoreje amashuri yisumbuye muri GS Aspeka Kayenzi.
Yatangiye uyu mwuga muri Kamena 2019. Acuranga ahantu hatandukanye harimo muri People iherereye Kacyiru, Sandauna ku Kimihurura, Active Pub yâ€™i Remera, LG Equator Remera na Down Town Club.
Buri Cyumweru acuranga mu kiganiro gica kuri TV1 kuva saa yine zâ€™ijoro cyitwa The Close up.
Mu ndoto ze ashaka kuzaba umu-DJ mpuzamahanga ndetse guhera muri Gicurasi arateganya kujya gukorera muri Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo.
 DJ Makeda
Makeda yavukiye muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika mu 1987. Uyu mukobwa yakuriye muri Jamaica ari naho yigiye kugeza muri kaminuza avanayo impamyabumenyi yâ€™icyiciro cya kabiri cya Kaminuza mu Buvanganzo bwâ€™Icyongereza.
Ni umukobwa wabyawe nâ€™Umunya-Jamaica Ann Marie Witter na se wâ€™Umunyarwanda Aloys Karamuheto wamamaye mu Rwanda nka Bongoman ari umuhanzi akaba nâ€™umu DJ mu njyana ya Reggae.
Makeda agitangira kwinjira mu byo kuvanga imiziki yahereye mu kabyiniro kitwaga DMH Club [ubu kafunze imiryango] kabaga i Nyamirambo.
Yabyinjiyemo nyuma yâ€™uko icyo gihe aho yasohokeraga hose yabangamirwaga nâ€™uko aba DJ bariho icyo gihe bacurangaga.Yarabyize ubu abikora nkâ€™umwuga ndetse atumirwa mu bitaramo bitandukanye bikomeye.
Hari nâ€™abandi bakobwa basoje amasomo muri Scratch Music Academy barimo DJ Iris, DJ Ariane ucuranga muri +250 iherereye Sonatube na DJ K.C gusa bo ntabwo baramenyakana cyane kuko batajya bacuranga mu tubyiniro twinshi nka bagenzi babo.

Title: Cyusa yahishuye ibye nâ€™umukobwa uba muri Canada wamwibarukiye imfura nâ€™ibyâ€™indi nkumi bari gukundana
Body:
Umuhanzi wâ€™indirimbo gakondo Cyusa Ibrahim mu masaha make ashize nibwo yahishuye ko yibarutse umwana we wâ€™imfura yahise yita Cyusa Ayan Rwego, icyakora umukobwa babyaranye we atuye muri Canada mu gihe uyu muhanzi afite undi mukunzi bari gukundana muri iki gihe.
Umuhanzi wâ€™indirimbo gakondo Cyusa Ibrahim mu masaha make ashize nibwo yahishuye ko yibarutse umwana we wâ€™imfura yahise yita Cyusa Ayan Rwego, icyakora umukobwa babyaranye we atuye muri Canada mu gihe uyu muhanzi afite undi mukunzi bari gukundana muri iki gihe.
Cyusa yahoze afite umukobwa wâ€™umunyarwandakazi bakundanaga usigaye aba muri Canada, gusa urukundo rwabo rwaje kujya ku iherezo baratandukana.
Uyu mukobwa atifuje gutangaza amazina, yabyariye muri Canada ku mu ijoro ryo ku wa Mbere, umwana wâ€™imfura kuri Cyusa.
Iyi mfura isanze se yaratandukanye na nyina kuko Cyusa afite undi mukobwa basigaye bakundana muri iki gihe uba muri Kigali, gusa avuga ko azakomeza kubahiriza inshingano ze nkâ€™umubyeyi.
Ati â€œUwo twabyaranye twaratandukanye, ntabwo byakunze ko dukomezanya. Byabaye ngombwa ko duhagarika ariko ntibikuraho ko yari amfitiye umwana niyo mpamvu navuze ko umwana ari umugisha. Ubu ntabwo ndi njye nyine mfite umukunzi twaje gukundana nyuma yo gutandukana nâ€™uwa mbere.â€
Bigenze neza, Cyusa ateganya ko umwaka utaha cyangwa mu 2022 ashobora gushyingiranwa nâ€™uwo bari kumwe.
Cyusa Ibrahim ni umwe mu bahanzi bari gukorana imbaraga nyinshi mu guteza imbere umuziki gakondo. Aherutse gushyira hanze indirimbo yise â€œImparambaâ€ yaririmbwaga mu matorero ya kera.
Uyu muhanzi yaherukaga mu gihugu cyâ€™u Bubiligi aho yari yagiye mu bitaramo bizenguruka u Burayi ariko biza gusubikwa kubera icyorezo cya COVID-19, ibintu avuga ko byamuteje igihombo ariko na none ntacyo yari kubikoraho kuko ari icyorezo kandi gihangayikishije Isi.

Title: DJ Pius yasohoye indirimbo â€œUbuzima bushiraâ€ yanditse akomoye inganzo ku rupfu rwa Mowzey Radio

Title: Yasiragiye igihe kinini: Ibyo utamenye ku rugendo rwa Yvanny Mpano muri muzika
Body:
Yvanny Mpano uri mu bahanzi bari kuzamuka neza bakunzwe muri iki gihe yavuye imuzi ubuzima bwe nâ€™uko yamaze imyaka myinshi asiragira mu muziki bikaza kumukundira nyuma yâ€™igihe avuye kuwiga ku Nyundo.
Yvanny Mpano uri mu bahanzi bari kuzamuka neza bakunzwe muri iki gihe yavuye imuzi ubuzima bwe nâ€™uko yamaze imyaka myinshi asiragira mu muziki bikaza kumukundira nyuma yâ€™igihe avuye kuwiga ku Nyundo.
Uyu musore ubusanzwe yitwa Mutangana Yves ariko mu muziki yiyita Yvanny Mpano. Yavukiye mu Karere ka Nyarugenge tariki ya 1 Nyakanga 1989.
Mu mashuri yisumbuye yize Amateka, Ubukungu nâ€™Ubumenyi bwâ€™isi [HEG].
Ni imfura mu muryango wâ€™abana babiri bâ€™abahungu. Mu 2011 ubwo yari yitabiriye irushanwa rya Talent Detection nibwo yahuye na Lick Lick wari umwe mu bagize Akanama Nkemurampaka muri iryo rushanwa, wamukunze akamukorera indirimbo ye yambere yise "Wagiye he".
Mu 2013 yinjiye mu ishuri rya muzika ryo ku Nyundo aharangiza mu 2017, anatangira kwigisha muzika mu mashuri abanza. Mu 2019 yagarutse muri muzika. Uyu musore azi gucuranga guitar.
Kuri ubu ni umwe mu bahanzi birahirwa na benshi kubera ubuhanga buri mu ndirimbo ze yaba mu myandikire, imiririmbire ndetse nâ€™uko yitwara mu mashusho.
Ibihangano bye bikora ku mitima ya benshi bakazamura amarangamutima kubera amagambo aryoheye amatwi ndetse umusore cyangwa inkumi wayifashisha atera imitoma umukunzi we nta kabuza arahirwa.
Yari ifite inzozi zo kuba umukinnyi wâ€™umupira wâ€™amaguru ukomeye aza kugira imvune
Kuva mu 2008 uyu musore yakundaga umuziki ariko akabikomatanya no gukina umupira wâ€™amaguru.
Ati â€œNatangiye gukunda umuziki mu 2008 niga mu mashuri yisumbuye mu cyiciro rusange, mbere nakundaga umupira wâ€™amaguru ndetse narakinaga, gusa umuziki uza kunganza. Natangiye kubyiyumvamo buhoro ndirimba mu rusengero, niga guitar. Nasohoye indirimbo ya mbere mu 2011 nyikorewe na Lick Lick yitwaga â€˜Wagiye he?â€™.
Mu mupira wâ€™amaguru avuga ko atawukinaga yishimisha kuko yakinaga imyanya ibiri yose kandi akabikora neza kuko yari impano yemeze ko yakuraga kuri se.
Ati â€œNtabwo nishimishaga mu mupira wâ€™amaguru, nakinaga mu izamu ndetse ndi nâ€™umwataka kandi byose nkabikora neza. Nakuze mbona amafoto ya papa nawe wakinaga uyu mukino ari umunyezamu nkura mbikunda nza no gusanga mbishoboye. Naje kugira imvune yâ€™ukuguru kwâ€™iburyo turi mu mikino ihuza amashuri nza kugira ubwoba gusa na none umutima wanjye wansunikiraga mu muziki.â€
â€œNari nziko bizakunda ku ndirimbo ya mbere. Hari Group yâ€™abana bari baturutse i Kayonza, bumva ukuntu ndirimba bansaba kubashyiriramo inyikirizo bampa 15 000 Frw mbona umuziki ushobora kuba urimo akantu.â€
Umuziki waramusiragije, duke abonye akawumenamo ariko bikanga
Ati â€œ Nabaye umuhanzi wo mu byiciro bibiri cyane ko nakoze umuziki mbere yâ€™uko njya kwiga ku Nyundo, ndabyibuka 2011-2013 nibwo nagiye guhatana nshaka kujya kwiga umuziki ariko nari mfite indirimbo eshatu. Mu 2014 nibwo nagiye kwiga ndangiza mu 2017, nize kuririmba.â€
Akirangiza amashuri yisumbuye ntabwo yatekereje kujya kwiga muri kaminuza ahubwo yatekereje ikintu yakora kikajya kimuha amafaranga yo gushora mu muziki .
Ati â€œNakoraga akazi ko kwakira abantu, nakoze aka kazi imyaka itatu. Amafaranga nakuraga hariya niyo nashoraga mu muziki kandi nanahembwaga make ariko nkakora icyo nakwita kubiba, nkavuga nti hari umunsi aya mafaranga azagaruka.â€
Uyu musore yari asanzwe afite akazi ubwo yafataga umwanzuro wo kujya kwiga umuziki, ahitamo kukareka ngo ajye kugerageza mu muziki yari yarimariyemo arebe ko bikunda.
Ati â€œNjya kwiga ku Nyundo nagiye nsize akazi nakoraga. Ndavuga nti reka njye kureba ukuntu bimeze nimbona ari byiza nzakomeza. Inyota nari mfite ni ukureba igisobanuro cyâ€™umuziki. Ikintu cya mbere nakuyeyo nabaye umunyamuziki wuzuye numva ko ikintu mfite nagisobanurira umuntu.â€
Mu 2014 yararambiwe akora indirimbo ya nyuma avuga ko nidakundwa azahita areka umuziki ariko ku bwâ€™amahire yumva itangazo risaba abashaka kujya kwiga umuziki kwiyandikisha ahita ajya kuwiga atyo, atangira gukabya inzozi ze.
Ati â€œMu muryango bageze aho bararambirwa, hari ukuntu batabyumvaga neza gusa nyuma bageze aho barabyumva. Bakambwira bati ibintu ukoze imyaka ine bitarakunda urabona bizavamo? Urumva utamaze gukura? Nakoze iyitwa Karahanyuze mu 2014 numva ariyo ya nyuma, naka inguzanyo ku kazi nkora ibishoboka byose ariko nayo iranga. Nyuma yâ€™ukwezi nibwo nahise njya kwiga ku Nyundo.â€
Indirimbo ye yamamaye cyane yise â€˜â€˜Ndabigukundiraâ€ avuga ko kwamamara kwayo bitamutunguye kuko ajya kuyikora yarebye icyo atari afite akagishyiramo imbaraga, yanasohoka akabona umuntu wishyura ikorwa ryayo mu buryo bwâ€™amashusho.
Ati â€œ Haje umuntu ansaba ko nayikorera amashusho kandi njye narumvaga nta gahunda yabyo mfite. Yishyuye ibintu byose.â€
Ubu Yvanny Mpano akora umuziki mu buryo bwâ€™umwuga ndetse yemeza ko kuva muri Kanama 2019 yatangiye kubona ibiraka ahantu hatandukanye mu bukwe abikesheje indirimbo yise â€˜Ndabigukundiraâ€™.
Uyu musore ateganya gushyira hanze album ye ya mbere, ndetse amaze gukora muri studio indirimbo enye zizaza zisanga izindi yamaze gukora zikanakundwa cyane.
Mu buhanzi bwe abahanzi afatiraho icyitegererezo cyane Kidum aza imbere kubera ukuntu aririmba ubuvanganzo bwâ€™Ikirundi ariko akanakunda cyane indirimbo zo mu rurimi rwâ€™Igifaransa.
Ikiganiro IGIHE yagiranye na Yvanny Mpano

Cyusa na we arakataje mu muziki. Mu gihe kirengaho gato umwaka amaze atangiye gushyira hanze ibihangano, ni umwe mu barangamiwe mu gisekuru cye kubera gutera umugongo injyana zâ€™amahanga akimakaza gakondo.
Mu 2012 nibwo yatangiye gukora umuziki. Yawinjiyemo byeruye mu 2019 ubwo yasezeraga akazi yakoraga agatangaza ko ubuzima bwe bwose ari wo agiye guha umwanya.

Title: Urugendo rwa Jay-Z ufatwa nkâ€™umuhanzi wa mbere wa Hip hop utunze miliyari yâ€™amadolari
Body:
Jay-Z amaze imyaka irenga 20 muri bya bindi abahanzi mu njyana ya Hip hop bita â€œHustleâ€, ni ugushakisha ubuzima, amanywa nâ€™ijoro. Jay-Z amaze imyaka irenga 20 muri bya bindi abahanzi mu njyana ya Hip hop bita â€œHustleâ€, ni ugushakisha ubuzima, amanywa nâ€™ijoro. Ni umugabo wagize uruhare runini mu guhindura uko abantu babona injyana ya Hip hop ku Isi, abera kandi icyitegererezo abandi benshi batabarika bashakaga gutera imbere.
Mu 2019, nibwo Forbes yatangaje ko uyu mugabo ariwe muhanzi wa mbere mu njyana ya Hip hop ufite umutungo ubarirwa muri miliyari yâ€™amadolari.
Shawn Cater wamenyekanye nka Jay-Z yakuriye mu buzima butoroshye, kuko imyaka ye yâ€™ubuto yacurujeho ibiyobyabwenge. Ku myaka 13 nibwo yatangiye gutekereza kuzaba umuherwe, ariko ntiyatekereza ko rap yabimugezaho.
Yumvaga ko ashobora gukina Basketball, bityo ikamugeza ku nzozi ze icyakora si ko byagenze.
Ni urugendo asangiye nâ€™abandi benshi bahereye ku busa, nkâ€™inshuti ye magara, P Diddy, Sean Combs; na we watangiye acuruza ibinyamakuru ku mihanda yâ€™i New York nyuma yo kuva mu ishuri.
Uyu mugabo wâ€™imyaka 50, yinjiye mu muziki bitandukanye nâ€™abandi benshi muri iki gihe kuko we yamenyekanye akuze.
Mbere na mbere yegereye sosiyete zitandukanye zifasha abahanzi, ariko nta nâ€™imwe yigeze imufasha.
Indirimbo ye ya mbere yasohotse kuri album yise Reasonable Doubt mu 1996 afite imyaka 27.
Kuva icyo gihe amaze gushyira hanze album 12. Amaze kwegukana Grammy Awards 21, nâ€™ibindi bihembo byinshi.
Album yamwubakiye izina ni Blue Print yo mu 2001, yari iriho indirimbo nka Song Cry nâ€™izindi.
Nyuma yakoze izindi zirimo nka Magna Carta Holy Grail, nyuma yâ€™imikoranire na Samsung yamuhaye miliyoni eshanu zâ€™amadolari kugira ngo ariyo iyigiraho uburenganzira busesuye mbere yâ€™abandi.
Iheruka ni iyo yashyize hanze mu 2017 yitwa 4:44. Ni ukuvuga saa kumi nâ€™iminota 44, iriho indirimbo zigaruka ku buzima bwe no ku byo yashinjwaga byo guca inyuma umugore we BeyoncÃ©.
Ni yo album yatangiyemo ubutumwa bwatumye bongera kwiyunga nyuma yâ€™uko byavugwaga ko bashobora gutana.
Muzika ntabwo ariyo yamwinjirije ubutunzi bwe muri iki gihe, ahubwo yabukuye mu bindi bikorwa. Birimo nka Sosiyete ze nka Rocawear, Roc Nation Sports, 40/40 Club, Tidal nâ€™izindi.
Ufashe ibikorwa bye byose ukabiteranya, agaciro kabyo karenze miliyari yâ€™amadolari, ubwo ntubariyemo umutungo wâ€™umugore we BeyoncÃ© Knowless ubarirwa muri miliyoni 500 zâ€™amadolari.
Mbere na mbere Jay-Z yaje kuvumbura ko ashobora gukora sosiyete ye bwite yâ€™imyenda aho gukomeza kumenyekanisha iyâ€™abandi, niko guhita ashinga Rocawear yatangiye mu 1999. Mu 2007 yaje kuyigurisha kuri miliyoni 204 zâ€™amadolari na Iconix.
Reka twinjire mu mutungo bwite wa Jay-Z
Kugira ngo ubashe kubara amafaranga afite, bisaba kureba imigabane afite muri sosiyete zitandukanye nko muri sosiyete ikora champagne yitwa Armand de Brignac. Afite imigabane ingana na 100% ya Armand de Brignac.
Armand de Brignac
Ni champagne iza mu icupa risa na zahabu, mu 2006 yashyize hanze ubwoko bwayo Ace of Spades. Icupa rimwe kugira ngo rikorwe, bitwara amadolari 13 ariko ryageze ku isoko rigahagarara agera kuri 300.
Iyo sosiyete ifite agaciro kabarirwa muri miliyoni 310 zâ€™amadolari.
Imigabane ye muri sosiyete zitandukanye
Jay-Z afite imigabane mu bigo bitandukanye ibarirwa agaciro ka miliyoni 220 zâ€™amadolari.
Urugero ni muri Uber, aho afite imigabane ifite agaciro ka miliyoni 70 zâ€™amadolari. Bivugwa ko yayiguze miliyoni ebyiri zâ€™amadolari mu 2013.
Dâ€™UssÃ©
Ubu nabwo ni ubwoko bwâ€™inzoga bwa Jay- Z, aho abufatanyije nâ€™uruganda rwa Bacardi. Bibarwa ko nabwo buhagaze agera kuri miliyoni 100 zâ€™amadolari.
Tidal
Mu 2015, Jay-z yatangije Tidal, urubuga rushyirwaho indirimbo zâ€™abahanzi, ahamo imigabane abandi bahanzi kugira ngo bamufashe mu kuba indirimbo zabo zazajya zihagera mbere yâ€™ahandi.
Yashakaga guhangana na iTunes, Spotify nâ€™izindi mbuga zinyuzwaho imiziki.
Abahanzi bose bafite amasezerano muri Tidal, bemeye ko indirimbo zabo zizajya zihajya mbere yâ€™uko zigera ahandi. Tidal ifite agaciro ka miliyoni 100 zâ€™amadolari.
Roc Nation
Ni sosiyete ifasha abahanzi imaze imyaka igera kuri 20 itangiye. Roc Nation ifite kandi igice gifasha abakinnyi bâ€™umupira cyitwa Roc Nation Sports, aho Jay-z akora nkâ€™ushinzwe kubashakira amakipe.
Ni we uhagararariye abarimo Kevin Durant, Kylie Irving, benshi bakina muri NFL, abakina mu mupira wâ€™amaguru nka Jerome Boateng, Kevin De Bruyne, Romelu Lukaku, Eric Bailly nâ€™abandi. Iyi ibarirwa miliyoni 75 zâ€™amadolari.
Usibye ibi, amafaranga yinjizwa nâ€™ibihangano bye bya muzika muri album 12 amaze gushyira hanze, abarirwa muri 75 zâ€™amadolari.
Jay-z atunze kandi ibihangano byâ€™ubugeni byinshi yagiye agura muri za cyamunara nâ€™ahandi. Byo bibarwa ko bifite agaciro ka miliyoni 70 zâ€™amadolari ya Amerika.
Uyu mugabo wâ€™abana batatu kandi, afite umutungo urimo inzu zifite agaciro ka miliyoni 50 zâ€™amadolari.
Nyuma yâ€™uko we nâ€™umugore we BeyoncÃ© bibarutse impanga mu 2017, baguze inzu ebyiri zirimo imwe iri mu gace ka East Hampton i New York ifite agaciro ka miliyoni 26 zâ€™amadolari nâ€™indi ya miliyoni 88 iri California.
Jay- Z afite kandi indi nzu iri i New York ahitwa Tribeca ifite agaciro ka miliyoni 6.85.
Jay- Z abarizwa mu bindi bikorwa bitandukanye, nkâ€™aho aherutse kugirwa umwe mu bayobozi bâ€™uruganda rwâ€™imyenda rwa Puma, intego ze zikaba ari ukurufasha mu gukora inkweto zishobora kwambarwa nâ€™abakinnyi ba Basketball kuko Nike na Adidas zari zaramaze kurwanikira muri uyu mukino.

Â 	 Sound City
Sound City yagiye hanze mu 2013. Ni imwe mu zikwiriye kurebwa nâ€™abakunda cyane injyana ya Rock. Ni filime mbarankuru yakozwe na Dave Grohl of Nirvana na Foo Fighters fame.
Ivuga ku nkuru yâ€™inzu itunganya umuziki yo mu Mujyi wa Los Angeles muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika aho indirimbo zitagira ingano na album zakorewe hazwi nka Sound City Studios.

Igaragaza uburyo iyi studio yavuye mu buryo bwo gukora indirimbo bwakoreshwaga kera buzwi nka Analogue ikajya mu bugezweho bwa Digital, imara iminota 107.

Title: Uko Danny Nanone yabaye imbarutso ya â€˜Dedeâ€™ yakozwe nâ€™ukorera Khaligraph Jones wo muri Kenya
Body:
Muri iki gihe uwavuga ko indirimbo Davis D yashyize hanze mu mezi atanu ashize yise â€˜Dedeâ€™, iri mu zikunzwe ntabwo yaba agiye kure yâ€™ukuri.
Muri iki gihe uwavuga ko indirimbo Davis D yashyize hanze mu mezi atanu ashize yise â€˜Dedeâ€™, iri mu zikunzwe ntabwo yaba agiye kure yâ€™ukuri.
Ni indirimbo ikunzwe mu rubyiruko ku buryo ikirori itacunzwemo abanyabirori bataha bivovota. Yihariye imyanya yâ€™imbere mu tubyiniro dutandukanye mu Rwanda, mu maradiyo ndetse ubu imaze kurebwa nâ€™abasaga miliyoni imwe ku rubuga rwa YouTube.
Kuva yajya hanze yasamiwe hejuru ndetse nâ€™uyu munsi iracyakunzwe mu buryo bukomeye. Ubaye waritabiriye ibitamo bya Tour du Rwanda byabaye muri Gashyantare cyangwa se igitaramo cya Kigali Jazz Junction cyasoje uko kwezi nta kabuza wahita wibuka ukuntu abantu bayibyinaga bigatinda ndetse hari naho yasabwaga kuyisubiramo.
Davis D yabwiye IGIHE guhimba iyi ndirimbo yabitangiye mu 2017 ubwo yagiraga igitekerezo cyo gukora indirimbo ivuga ku muntu umeze nkâ€™umwami ku mukobwa wemerewe ikintu cyose kuri we.
Ati â€œDede natangiye kuyandika mu 2017, nibwo nagize igitekerezo cyayo biturutse kuri Danny Nanone twabaga muri label ya Incredible ya Bagenzi Bernard, yaravuze ati ibaze hari umuntu ukoze indirimbo yitwa inkongoro ya Dede icyo gihe twari turi kwa Producer Pastor P. Muri njye nari mfite igitekerezo cyo gukora indirimbo ivuga ku muntu wemerewe ibintu byose birimo abagore beza, itabi ryiza, inzoga nziza nâ€™ibindi.â€
Akomeza avuga ko yamaranye iyi ndirimbo igihe ategereje kuzabona umu-producer uyikora ujyanye nâ€™ibyo we yumvaga afite mu ntekerezo nâ€™uko yifuzaga ko iyi ndirimbo yazaza imeze.
Ati â€œNahoraga ntekereza nti ni inde Producer uzanyemeza akankorera iyi ndirimbo, ntabwo nari nzi ahantu azava, nari narafashe icyemezo cyâ€™uko ni biba ngombwa nzanajya muri Nigeria nkashaka umuntu uyikora kuko nashakaga ko iba indirimbo nini.â€
â€œMotif wayikoze mu buryo bwâ€™amajwi yaje mu Rwanda bambwira ko ariwe ukorera Khaligraph Jones gusa sinamumenya, inshuro ya mbere aragenda, inshuro ya kabiri yaje avuga ko ashaka umuntu waririmbye indirimbo yitwa â€˜Hennessyâ€™. Ibintu yancurangiye bwa mbere nahise numva ko bihuye, numvishe ari muntu wâ€™inzozi zanjye nari mfite ngo ankorere ya ndirimbo.â€
Kuri we ngo ntabwo yumvaga ko iyi ndirimbo izagera ku rwego iriho uyu munsi gusa ngo yayikoze buri kimwe kiyigize yacyitondeye ndetse imuraza amajoro ku buryo nyuma yâ€™ikorwa ryâ€™amashusho yayo yamaze igihe mu gitanda.
Ati â€œNtabwo numvaga ko izagera ku rwego iriho ubu nâ€™ubwo buri kintu cyayo cyose nacyitonderaga. Niyo ndirimbo yamvunnye nkamara iminsi ibiri nyuma yo gukora amashusho yayo, ntabyuka ariko ni nayo ndirimbo ya mbere yankoreye ibitandukanye nâ€™ibyâ€™izindi ndirimbo zose nakoze.â€
David Icyishaka uzwi nka Davis D avuga ko iyi ndirimbo isobanuye ikintu gikomeye kuri we kuko ariyo ya mbere mu ndirimbo ze igize abayirebye bagera kuri miliyoni, ikintu avuga ko kizamufasha cyane mu muziki we.
Iyi ndirimbo mu buryo bwâ€™amajwi yakorewe muri Ida Records na Producer Motif [Morris Kobia] ukorera umuhanzi Khaligraph Jones uri mu nkingi za mwamba mu bahanzi bo muri Kenya, mu gihe amashusho yayo yakozwe na Bagenzi Bernard.
Naason ni umwe mu bayanditse afatanyije na Davis D, Bagenzi Bernard nawe afatanya na Motif gushaka amanota amwe nâ€™amwe.
Davis D yamamaye cyane mu Rwanda ubwo yakoraga indirimbo yise â€˜Biryogoâ€™ ikamutumbagiza ku rwego rwo hejuru. Yamenyekanye mu zindi zirimo â€˜Irekureâ€™, â€˜My peopleâ€™, â€˜Sweet loveâ€™, â€˜Hennessyâ€™ yanagaragajemo umukobwa witwa Lydia bakundanaga bagatandukana, â€˜Sosoâ€™, â€˜Like Youâ€™ yahuriyemo na Kevin Kade & Seyn nâ€™izindi.

Title: Zacu TV yakuyeho ikiguzi abantu basabwaga ngo barebe filime nyarwanda
Body:
Hakuweho ikiguzi abantu basabwaga kugira ngo babashe kureba filime nyarwanda kuri Zacu TV muri iki gihe u Rwanda nâ€™Isi yose byugarijwe nâ€™icyorezo cya Covid-19.
Hakuweho ikiguzi abantu basabwaga kugira ngo babashe kureba filime nyarwanda kuri Zacu TV muri iki gihe u Rwanda nâ€™Isi yose byugarijwe nâ€™icyorezo cya Covid-19.
Zacu tv isanzwe itambutsa filime zâ€™abanyarwanda na Tanzania ku rubuga rwayo rwa zacutv.com. Yatangaje ko yifatanyije nâ€™abanyarwanda aho bari ku isi hose ibaha uburyo bwo kureba izi filime ku buntu mu gihe cyâ€™iminsi 14 ishobora no kongerwa mu rwego rwo kwifatanya nabo muri ibi bihe bya COVID-19.
Ku muntu usanzwe ufite konti kuri Zacutv.com, arajya kuri urwo rubuga nagera aho bamusaba kwishyura ajye ahanditse â€œ Coupon Codeâ€. Muri icyo gice, arabona aho ashyira kode yandikemo â€œSTAYHOMEâ€ atangire kureba nta kiguzi asabwe.
Aha niho umuntu abona aho ashyiriramo kode
Mu kiganiro twagiranye na Wilson Misago, Umuyobozi wa ZACU TV yagize atiâ€ Zacutv isanzwe iha abantu amafilime mu bihe byiza, rero ntabwo twabibagirwa no mu bihe nkâ€™ibi bikomeye Isi yose iri kurwana no kwirinda ikwirakwizwa rya Covid-19. Niyo mpamvu twabaye dukuyeho amafaranga twacaga abantu ngo babashe kureba filime kuri porogaramu yacuâ€
Zacu tv ni urubuga rwa internet rumaze imyaka ibiri rwerekanirwaho filime nyarwanda zitandukanye harimo izakunzwe nka City Maid, Seburikoko, Intare yâ€™ingore,Amarira yâ€™urukundo, Giramata nâ€™izindi nyinshi.
Kuri ubu uru rubuga rufite filime zâ€™uruhererekane zirenga 1,500 ndetse nâ€™amafilime arangira arenga 300.
Ubusanzwe abantu barebera kuri uru rubuga bishyura amafaranga angana hafi nâ€™ibihumbi bitanu ku kwezi (5000 Frw).
Zacutv.com ifite abamaze kwiyandikishaho(Subscribers) barenga ibihumbi 20 baturuka mu bihugu birenga 130 byo ku isi.

Title: Diane wo muri City Maid yahishuye umusore bakundana, anakomoza ku rukundo yavuzwemo na Yverry

Title: Indirimbo Henzapu ya Bruce Melodie yasibwe kuri Youtube ku mpamvu ziswe urugomo

Uyu mugabo yavuze ko ibisabwa byose babifite cyane ko iyi ndirimbo inandikwa cyangwa ikorwa yakozwe mu buryo bwa Live kuri youtube bityo amashusho yafashwe icyo gihe akaba amwe mu yifashishwa nkâ€™ibimenyetso byo kubarenganura.
Kabanda yavuze ko ibyo aba bareze iyi ndirimbo adashaka kubitindaho kuko ari ukubiha agaciro bidafite, ahubwo asanga bo bakwiye gukora ibyo bakwiye gukora kuruta kwirirwa baterana amagambo nâ€™ababareze ibinyoma ahubwo bashaka gukora urugomo.
Iyi ndirimbo yakozwe nyuma yâ€™igihe cyâ€™amasaha abiri iminota cumi nâ€™ibiri nâ€™amasegonda mirongo ine (2:12:40), Bruce Melodie yanditse indirimbo, injyana (beat) irakorwa, afata amajwi, iranononsorwa, akanyuzamo akaruhuka ndetse agafata icyo kurya byose biri â€˜Liveâ€™ kuri Shene ye ya Youtube.
Uyu muhanzi yasohoye iyi ndirimbo ku wa mbere tariki 24 Werurwe 2020 iherekejwe nâ€™amagambo aririmba (Audio Lyrics).
Mu buryo bwâ€™amajwi (Audio) iyi ndirimbo yakozwe na Producer Element ikorerwa muri studio Country Records naho â€˜masteringâ€™ yakozwe na Bob Pro.

Title: Bruce Melodie yasobanuye indirimbo ye nshya â€œHenzapuâ€, anakomoza ku mpamvu adakora ubukwe
Body:
Umuhanzi Bruce Melodie yasobanuye byinshi ku ndirimbo ye nshya â€˜Henzapuâ€™ aherutse gukora imbonankubone ku mbuga nkoranyambaga, ari nako ayishyiramo ibyifuzo byâ€™abafana, anavuga ku mpamvu adakora ubukwe.

IGIHE yasanze Melodie mu rugo iwe muri ibi bihe Abanyarwanda basabwa kuguma mu ngo zabo mu rwego rwo kwirinda Coronavirus.
Bruce Melodie avuga ko indirimbo â€˜Henzapuâ€™ yayikoreye abakunzi be mu rwego rwo kubarinda irungu muri ibi bihe basabwa kuguma mu ngo zabo hirindwa Coronavirus.
Ibijyanye nâ€™ubusobanuro bwâ€™iyi ndirimbo, Bruce Melodie yavuze ko atabasha gusobanura indirimbo iririmbye mu Kinyarwanda.
Mu ndirimbo nshya, hari aho yaririmbyemo ibyâ€™uko atarakora ubukwe, abajijwe impamvu yahisemo kubiririmba, yagize ati â€œNi ibintu byumvikana, mvugamo ko arinjye waburiye mu kwe kandi mu Kinyarwanda bavuga ko uwaburiye mu kwe ntako aba atagize. Si ukuba ntabushaka ahubwo byaranze.â€
Icyakora avuga ko yizeye ko mu gihe cyizaza ibintu bizatungana agakora igikwiye.
Bruce Melodie avuga ko muri iyi ndirimbo yashakaga kubwira urubyiruko nâ€™abanyarwanda ko nubwo uyu munsi byaba bitameze neza ariko bagomba kwizera ko imbere ari heza.
Uyu muhanzi avuga ko ibihe byo kuguma mu rugo bitamutonze cyane kuko nubusanzwe ahaba ndetse ibikenerwa byose abihafite.
Ati â€œMu rugo hari byose hari nâ€™abantu banjye bose, ahubwo umuntu uvuga ngo mu rugo hamurambiye ubwo haba ari iwe? Nuwumva iwe atahakunze agerageze ahakunde kuko agomba kuhaba.â€
Bruce Melodie yavuze ko kuguma mu rugo byamuhaye umwanya wo kuba hamwe nâ€™umuryango we, akabasha no kugaragaza bumwe mu bumeyi afite burimo guteka.
Ati â€œNjye mfite ubumenyi ku bintu byo guteka. Nkâ€™ubu mu rugo ni njye uteka, ubu ndi kumwe nâ€™umuryango wanjye guteka simbikora mbyinubira, biri mu bintu nkunda. Iyo natetse barabikunda kandi barabirya bigashira.â€
Mu gihe icyorezo cyaba gitanze agahenge, uyu muhanzi yavuze ko afite ibikorwa binyuranye ari gutegura birimo amashusho yâ€™iyi ndirimbo ye nshya yahita afata ndetse no gusohora izindi ndirimbo zinyuranye.
Usibye gukurikiza amabwiriza Abanyarwanda bahabwa nâ€™inzego zibishinzwe hirindwa Coronavirus, Bruce Melodie yanabasabye kutarangarira iki cyorezo ngo birengagize ibindi byugarije Isi nka SIDA, Ebola nâ€™izindi.

Title: Indirimbo 10 zâ€™icyamamare Kenny Rogers zakunzwe bihebuje nâ€™abakunzi bâ€™umuziki

Kenny Rogers yabonye izuba ku wa 21 Nzeri 1938, avuka yitwa Kenneth Ray Rogers. Yavukiye mu Mujyi wa Houston mui Leta ya Texas muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika.
Yari umwanditsi wâ€™indirimbo, umukinnyi wa filime, producer na rwiyemezamirimo. Urugendo rwâ€™umuziki we yarutangiye mu 1957 ageza mu 2017. Yari afite ijwi ryâ€™umwihariko mu njyana ya Country ndetse yari azi gucuranga cyane gitari.

Ku wa 1 Ukwakira 1977 Rogers yashakanye na Marianne Gordon batandukana mu 1993 babyaranye umwana umwe. Umugore wa Gatanu bakoze ubukwe ku wa 1 Kamena 1997 babyaranye abana babiri.
Uyu mugabo yagize izina rikomeye mu njyana ya Country abicyesha indirimbo ze nka â€˜Islands in the Streamâ€™, â€˜Lucilleâ€™, â€˜She Believes in meâ€™, â€˜Through the yearsâ€™ nâ€™izindi.

Title: Ishavu ku mutimaâ€¦ Ikiganiro na Cyusa ku buzima bwe nâ€™umubano afitanye na Stromae
Body:

Uyu musore uri gusatira imyaka 31 amaze kwamamara mu bihangano bitandukanye bigaruka ku muco nyarwanda.
Umudiho uva mu itako, uyu musore avuka kuri Rutare Pierre inzobere bwubatsi ufite ibigwi i Kigali, wanagize uruhare rukomeye mu iyubakwa rya zimwe mu nyubako zâ€™i Kigali mu gihe cye harimo nâ€™imisusire yâ€™amasangano yo mu mujyi rwagati (Rond Point) . Yanamamaye mu mukino wa Basketball na Volleyball.
Cyusa ni umuvandimwe wa Stromae nawe uri mu bahanzi bakomeye ku Isi wamamaye mu ndirimbo zitandukanye zirimo â€˜Papaoutaiâ€™, â€˜Alors on danseâ€™, â€˜Formidableâ€™, â€˜Racine carrÃ©eâ€™ nâ€™izindi.
Cyusa na we arakataje mu muziki. Mu gihe kirengaho gato umwaka amaze atangiye gushyira hanze ibihangano, ni umwe mu barangamiwe mu gisekuru cye kubera gutera umugongo injyana zâ€™amahanga akimakaza gakondo.
Amaze gukora indirimbo zirimo â€˜Umutakoâ€™, â€˜Mbwire ndeâ€™, â€˜Rwanda Nkunda Migaboâ€™, â€˜Umwiteroâ€™ ndetse nâ€™iza kera yasubiyemo nka â€˜Imparambaâ€™ na â€˜Muhoza wanjyeâ€™.
IGIHE yamwegereye imuganiriza byinshi ku buzima bwe mu muziki no hanze yawo.
IGIHE: Uherutse gushyira hanze indirimbo wasubiyemo yitwa â€˜Imparambaâ€™ wabitekereje ute ?
Cyusa: Iriya ndirimbo ni iya kera, iri mu zo bita â€˜Intwatwaâ€™ nkâ€™uko wumva â€˜Benimanaâ€™ cyangwa â€˜Bagore bezaâ€™. Nabonye abantu batangiye kuyibagirwa ubu nashakaga kubumvisha ibitero byayo byâ€™umwimerere ngo bongere bayikunde nkâ€™uko bayikundaga. Iri mu zo nkunda cyane kandi irabyinitse.
IGIHE: Kuki watekereje umuziki gakondo kandi abasore nkawe benshi batabikunda ?
Cyusa: Ntabwo ari njye wayihisemo niyo yampisemo kuko ni ibintu natangiye mfite imyaka itanu, mbyina mu bukwe baduhemba ibihumbi bitanu ku kwezi bakatuguriramo amakayi. Narabikundaga cyane. Kuririmba kuri njye ni ubuzima.
IGIHE: Watangiye ubyina, kuririmba byo byaje gute ?
Cyusa: Nâ€™ubwo nabyinaga naririmbaga ku ruhande, naririmbaga ku biri kumbaho, nanahimbiraga ababyeyi banjye. Mfite indirimbo nahimbiye mama wanjye, nyogokuru, umukobwa twakundanye nâ€™abandi. Mbere narabyinaga nza kujya mu Itorero Inyamibwa, mu 2009 ndivamo mu 2010 mpita njya mu Nganzo Ngari nyivamo mu 2015 ntangira gukora ibyanjye.
Nabyinaga mu Inganzo Ngari nkora muri Banki, byose mbivamo ndavuga nti ngiye gukora umuziki gakondo uzantunga. Nabonaga ndi gucyeza abami babiri.
Hari amahoteli menshi yashakaga ko nzajya njya kuririmbayo mpitamo kureka akandi kazi aba aribyo nkurikira.
IGIHE: Uteganya kumurika Album ryari ?
Cyusa: Nateganyaga kuyimurika mu Ukuboza uyu mwaka ariko nibigera ntaragera ku byo nifuza nzabisubika.
IGIHE: Aho hantu ushaka kugera nihe ?
Cyusa: Ni igihe buri Munuyarwanda wese azaba azi izina Cyusa, ningera mu Ukuboza 2020 bimaze kuba gutyo nzayimurika.
IGIHE: Ni abahe bahanzi ufatiraho urugero ?
Cyusa : Uwa mbere ukinariho ni CÃ©cile Kayirebwa. Uretse kuba ari umuhanzi ni nâ€™umubyeyi wanjye cyane ko afite umwana twitiranwa, nanjye mba numva ndi umuhungu we. Kayirebwa yarabiharaniye, yakoze mu bihe bigoye. Yaritanze ku kuba umuziki gakondo ugeze aho ugeze.
Uwera Florida, Rugamba, Byumvuhore na Muyango nabo ndabakunda indirimbo zabo ziranyubaka.
IGIHE: Ni ikihe kintu utiya kurusha ibindi ?
Cyusa: Ni inzara.
IGIHE: Ni iki cyatuma ubeshya ?
Cyusa: Mbonye hari ibintu biri bunkoreho nabeshya.
IGIHE: Ni ikihe kintu umuntu yakora ugahita umwanga ?
Cyusa: Ni uwanga u Rwanda. Umuntu watuma dusubira mu mateka twanyuzemo namurwanya kuko ntabwo yaba ashaka ko ngira umutekano.
IGIHE: Ninde muntu wabayeho, wumva wakurikiza ?
Cyusa: Rugamba. Ntabwo nagize amahirwe yo guhura nawe ariko iyo numvise ibikorwa bye, uko yitangiye abanyarwanda, akavugisha ukuri akakuzira. Kuba yaritandukanije nâ€™ikibi akerekana ibyiza ndabimukundira
IGIHE: Ni ibihe bihe bibi wibuka wabayemo ?
Cyusa: Igihe cya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994. Nari umwana ariko ndabyibuka tujya kurara mu bihuru, ndabyibuka duhungaâ€¦
IGIHE: Ibihe byiza wabayemo ?
Cyusa: Iyo ndi kumwe nâ€™abakunda injyana gakondo. Abataramyi bose iyo ndi kumwe nabo ndanezerwa.
IGIHE: Kuba uvukana na Stromae kuri wowe bivuze iki ?
Cyusa: Bimpa ishyaka, bintera ishema kuba mfite umuvandimwe uririmba wâ€™icyamamare.
IGIHE: Mujya muvugana ?
Cyusa: Turavugana, ni umwana mwiza gusa ntabwo akunda gushyira hanze ubuzima bwe buri hanze yâ€™akazi. Ntabwo abikunda, niba yashyize hanze indirimbo murayikunda muyivugeho. Iyo muganiriye wumva ari umwana mwiza, ni imfura.
IGIHE: Azi Ikinyarwanda na gike?
Cyusa: Arakazi gake; ka kandi ngo bite? Muraho ? gusa nyine abaho nkâ€™abazungu kuruta kuba ari umunyarwanda kuko yarerewe i Burayi.
IGIHE: Nkâ€™iyo wasohoye indirimbo ukayimwoherereza akubwira iki ?
Cyusa : Arayireba akayikunda, akambwira ati komereza aho murumuna wanjye. Nkamushimira. Akambwira ati nâ€™ubwo ntari kubyumva ariko akambwira ati ndabibona ko amashusho ari meza.
IGIHE: Mu ndirimbo wakoze zose hari iyo yakubwiye ko akunda kurusha izindi?
Cyusa: Ntabwo akunda kuvuga byinshi ntugire ngo turasahinda, ariko iyo mwoherereje yose arayishima.
IGIHE: Iyo wivuga ukunze kugaragaza ko ugira agahinda ko utabashije kumenya papa waweâ€¦.
Cyusa: Urumva Data Rutare Pierre yapfuye muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994, nari mafite imyaka ine gutyo urumva mu byâ€™ukuri biba bigoye kuba nakwibuka isura ye. Yakundaga no kujya hanze cyane. Kuri Mama turi babiri, kuri Papa turi batandatu.
IGIHE: Umubyeyi wawe yari icyamamare, ni iki cyihariye bajya bamukubwiraho?
Cyusa: Yari umuhanga. Yubatse amazu menshi hari nâ€™inzu yari mu rugando bambwiye ko yaguzwe miliyoni yâ€™amadorali. Abantu bose iyo tuganira barambwira bati twizere ko uri umuhanga nka so.
IGIHE: Ni iki wigira ku mubyeyi wawe?
Cyusa: Yakundaga akazi. Hari byinshi njya nkora mama akambwira ati uri Rutare koko, ikindi yagiraga igitsure.
IGIHE: Ni iyihe ntego ufite mu muziki wawe?
Cyusa: Biragoye ariko nzabigeraho. Ndashaka ko nko mu myaka 20 cyangwa 30, umuntu yajya atekereza injyana gakondo mu mutwe we hakazamo izina Cyusa. Nimbigeraho nzaba ngeze ku idembe.
